channel.title: Pages on Ask Yammer
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Ask Yammer

item.title: About Us
item.description: We’re a global team with a goal to help you with Yammer. The main blog writers here are: Alex Blaine - A Support Escalation Engineer and code monkey on the Yammer Support Escalation team. Brian Lyttle - A Escalation Engineer and all around genius when it comes to Python and other languages. Corrie Cason - A Support Escalation Engineer that came to us from a long tenure on the Project team.
